However it's ok for the body, I'm sure if you're looking for something for really sensitive skin it would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Mixed thoughts
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings and thoughts for this CeraVe moisturizing cream. Yes it does moisturize the face, and the moisture lasts all day long, so it is good, and the smell isn’t bad. However, my only negative remark I have to say about this cream, is that; it has alcohol in it. I have very sensitive skin and it started slightly burning my cheek as soon as I applied it. I still hadn’t even rubbed it in to my skin. So that’s about all I have to say about it. Try it for yourself and see how it works for you. We all have different skin and pain tolerance.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Changed my skin
customer_reviews.text: This crean seriously changed my dry flaky skin. TMI but my skin was so dry i also had flakes on my clothes. After just 1 or 2 applicatins, this cream changed my skin and it last for a few weeks. Now when i have bouts i just apply to get it back under control. This cream has changed my life. Only negative (and a BIG one) it has parabens.
customer_reviews.author: Asav88

customer_reviews.title: I love this and the Ingredients are Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my face per a dermatologist recommendation and it works great. I use to buy these expensive moisturizers, that often have fragrance which I can't stand in skincare, which often have crap ingredients, and are super expensive. This has Amazing ingredients, no fragrance, ceramides which the skin needs and is very moisturizing. I just wish it blended into skin a little easier, but for the quality, ingredients, and price. You can't beat it. This is Amazing and if you haven't tried it, You should, stop waisting your money on expensive moisturizers for your face, its all marketing anyway
customer_reviews.author: Katie Henes

customer_reviews.title: My Dermatologist recommended this product to me
customer_reviews.text: My Dermatologist recommended this product to me. I was raised in Southern Arizona and have extra dry skin as a result. This cream has helped me more than any other cream or product in the past. I agree with my Dermatologist is saying "I recommend this cream to everyone with dry skin problems". Feel free to ask any other questions as I will be glad to answer them.
customer_reviews.author: jimmie moore

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm finally using up the jar. It has had great reviews (by some) and thought it would help my dry skin. It isn't any better than other less expensive brands, leaves your skin feeling sticky and did not find the scent particularly appealing. I have had no skin issues other than dry skin (I'm a senior) but just did not enjoy using this product because it left a greasy, sticky feel to the skin, did not absorb easily.
customer_reviews.author: Delight Kilyan

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Very thick cream lotion BUT it absorbs nicely if you dont over apply and even then is mostly absorbs. I actually used this through all 9 months of my pregnancy and gained a horrendous amount of weight due to edema so my skin was STRETCHING to It's max and I did not get a single mark until after delivery when I had been to preoccupied to remember to use this. If you want something light tho this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: OK for body, BAD for face!
customer_reviews.text: Main ingredients sounded good but you never know until you try. I’m 64 and have had great skin for a long time. Within three days of applying this to my face, my skin became red and splotchy and little pimples began to appear. No other changes to my routine. I don’t have sensitive skin and have had issues with only one other product (Jack Black double duty lotion). I stopped using this lotion on my face and my skin began returning to normal. Live and learn!
customer_reviews.author: An Opinion

customer_reviews.title: No scent and very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I've written a couple reviews for CeraVe at this point and I really love their products. I use this twice a day on my face after washing it. It's really helped moisturize my super dry face without making it greasy. I use this and the CeraVe sunscreen in the morning and my face still isn't greasy. Absolutely wonderful. I use this at night, as well, because the night CeraVe is actually the only product I don't like, that one makes me break out, it's just a little much.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Salas

customer_reviews.title: Unscented and I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far superior to anything I have tried thus far! I have purchased several lotions but this is my favvvvvvv! First of all its whipped lotion that is thick at the same time but glides onto your skin... and my skin drinks it right up. It does not feel sticky or leave any stickiness which I like! I love it! It leaves my skin feeling soft and it does not irritate my skin! no scent what so ever as stated by the creator. LOve this and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed something new to try for my eczema on my face and I saw a lot of good reviews on how this moisturizer changed their life. So I was excited to try it but as soon as I put this on my face it burned really bad and I had some noticeable red irritations that went away after several minutes. Also after its on my face it feels really matte and I felt really dry like it gave my face a weird tight feeling. Since I opened and used this product, I guess I can't return it anymore so I'll just use it on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: IZ

customer_reviews.title: Learned from skin experts about this: So moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I FINALLY went and tried this out on a recommendation to put on my body after a shower, with my skin still fairly wet. WOW, what a difference. My legs have always been dry. I used it on my face as well before bed, but while laying there, I started smelling something that was REALLY like fake tan cream, which is awful. It was just a hint, but was enough that I try to cover it up with something else for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I've had kidney stones for a while and they make me use the restroom a ton, leading to a lot of handwashing. After a few months of this the oils in my fingers were pretty much gone and they dried out within moments of being wet and wrinkled like old dirty laundry. They cracked and bled within minutes after that. After months of using other, crappier moisturizers I found this stuff and its all been uphill since then. A side note for anyone interested, I'd go for the larger 19oz container simply because it has a lid and I don't trust any squirt bottle to make it through shipping.
customer_reviews.author: VonZrP

customer_reviews.title: It broke me out!
customer_reviews.text: So I don’t usually break out. Every few weeks I’ll get one pimple on my cheek. I have very dry skin and wanted my makeup to apply smoother so I bought this. I like that it’s hydrating but it’s been breaking me out non stop since I purchased it. I’ve been using for about two weeks and I would say I have about 8-10 pimples on my face now. Every day a new pimple pops up. It’s so frustrating. I’m not sure what exactly in it is causing me to break out but I won’t be buying again. I’m really disappointed especially after reading all the amazing reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Azalea Meza

customer_reviews.title: The best cream I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this cream. My skin was a mess from a long bout with PR. I used healing ointment, Sansa for itching and nothing helped. I felt an immediate difference within a couple of day. After a few weeks, my skin has turned around completely. This is the only cream besides Excipial(which is outrageously priced now for some reason), that keeps my legs hydrated during the winter months. I typically like scented creams with a fancy label, but this will be my go-to from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: What was I waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using twice every day as my skin gets incredibly dry during the winter and I suffer from exzema. It’s already been amazing and I plan to use it on my elbows, toes, fingers and other exzema-affected areas. My skin is noticeably softer to the touch and it’s a million dollars cheaper than my previous Sephora moisturizer. Doesn’t leave me oily in the AM and hasn’t negatively reacted to my skin in any way. I should have ordered this a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Woods

customer_reviews.title: Must buy you get a lot for your money recommended for your body and your hands
customer_reviews.text: The stuff is awesome my hands are so dry from washing my hands and this healed them practically instantaneously overnight I put some of my face but I broke out the next morning so I wouldn't recommend you apply on your face
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great For Eczema Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is great for extremely dry skin, face moisturizer, and eczema. I recommend you give this a go if you're suffering from chronic dry skin. I've also tried Amlactin, which I don't prefer for everyday use because it burns and leaves a sticky residue for me. I typically use Amlactin whenever I have a flare up, but I haven't had a flareup since I began using CeraVe.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Skin is soft like a baby’s butt
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the skin product. My daughter also loves it as she has sensitive skin and it does not cause any problems. We find that it helps with softening of the skin and it is fragrance free which helps tremendously. It does not leave an oily residue at all. This is one of the very few products that have ceramide and hyaluronic acid which help for pumping the skin and keeping it smooth like a babies butt. The price is on point at highly affordable
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER S. ITO

customer_reviews.title: Heals very dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have skin that tends to run dry, but is always HORRIBLY dry during the Fall and Winter months. I have tried several supplements and creams/lotions over the last few years and nothing made enough of a difference. I bought this after seeing it on one of the Buzzfeed listicles about the best products on Amazon and boy am I pleasantly surprised. My hands were visibly flaky and cracked and now look completely normal, healed, and no longer painful after just a week of using it. It’s very moisturizing. The smell is hard to describe but is very subtle and doesn’t linger long. I also have sensitive skin (and HS) and it has not bothered me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ash H

customer_reviews.title: Basic and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love using this before bed every night. I use it as a body moisturizer and a little for my face. I have combination skin on my face and I find it to be a little too heavy for a facial moisturizer. But it is a fabulous for my arms and legs. Used every night after showering for the whole winter and never had dry skin. That couldn't be said when I was using Hempz or even vaseline brand products. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Anon123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Body Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a repurchase. I usually buy locally, but the stores are mad right now. But this is the best body cream I've ever used. Some people use it on their faces, but I find it too heavy for that. The moisturization lasts all day, is fragrance free, and absorbs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: So good I had to order one for my wife, too.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a lotion person, and she buys Aveno by the case -- but one use of this stuff and she asked me to order her some (and she's been using mine). There is absolutely no scent, it is whipped and light and soaks right in. It's great for my sensitive skin and hers. Best of all, you will not believe how big this jar is for the price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: bluestategirl

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer because it is simple!
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is simple, which makes it great. It has the basic ingredients for it to be a hydrating moisturizer while leaving out all the extra ingredients that would irritate skin--odorless, etc. I can use very little on my face and feel moisturized or use a lot and not feel like it is caking on my skin as it absorbs easily over the course of a couple minutes. Application is easiest immediately after cleansing. It is inexpensive, and a tub of this size will last me at least six months.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I like how moist it makes my skin, but its so thick that it just doesn't dry into my skin well and I can feel it all day even after putting it on my skin at night. It also hasn't been that great at keeping acne away. I don't get bad acne, but I was doing okay for awhile and then it began breaking out in several spots after I started using it. Maybe it was just my skin adjusting to a new product since it has calmed down, but I'm still extra careful now to put as small amount as possible without leaving places without moisture.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Great body moisturizer (might give you back acne though)
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin. I can only use fungal acne safe facial products and unscented products on my body. This product was recommended by simpleskincarescience and I love this moisturizer for what it is. It moisturizes my skin and keeps it supple after a shower. However, if you get back acne easily, then ease up on this product because it gives me a few pimples here and there lol. Just make sure that you scrub your back w a gentle wash cloth or loofah every day/every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Linh N

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks of use Zero Results
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money I purchased this hoping it will help repair my red flaking skin from this super dry winter and I have seen zero improvement, there is no smell at all and it does not feel nourishing after you apply.
customer_reviews.author: gracie_gust

customer_reviews.title: Great product but this size needs a pump!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturizer but this large tub needs a pump included like they do with the smaller 14 Ounce size. I don't understand why they don't include that since this is a large almost industrial size and would really benefit from having a pump. That said, the cream is really good and long lasting. Even a day later, I feel like my skin is moisturized. I recommend Cerave!
customer_reviews.author: Mediahound 🎧

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with the big jar of moisturizing cream. 💕
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried Cera moisturizer cream. This was my first purchase. I have always used some type of cream after my morning shower. I was out of what I was using at the time and read the reviews for this cream and WOW I love the way it feels and moisturizing my skin. This it a BIG jar so I'm very generous with it. I will definitely purschase this product again and again because it's wonderful. The scent is so light it's not noticeable. It does leave my skin feel so nice 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: JenB

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. The odor is light so it isn't over smelly. Its formula provides a long lasting non greasy refreshing feeling on your face. Arms too. Have not tried on my legs yet. A little bit goes a long ways so the container will last awhile. I'm very pleased with how my dryest areas on my face have become softer. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sdc

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you need constant moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: The jar is larger than I expected which is nice. It came with a protective peel off cover for freshness. The jar is filled to the top. The moisturizer is thiccc, and you need very little. Im using this product with tretinoin as it causes skin peeling and redness along with sensitivity. This product has helped with all of those things. It didn’t irritate it soothed. I did try a little on my hand for while to check for reactions which I recommend with all new products. A little goes a long way. It will take me awhile to through, price/usage is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema. My face gets really dry & make up looks terrible with dry skin! I was desperate for a change. I added this cream to my daily routine & saw/felt a change with in a couple days. I put it on every morning & night after a shower/ skin care routine. It made my face feel so good & soft that i use it for my hands as well. Must buy. It lasted 2 months, ready for my second jar! (Let it dry completely before applying makeup)
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worst moisturizer out there. Doesnt do anything the post describes. Instead of actually leaving skin soft and clear. Made my skin red, irritated and started to break out. I never get acne or pimples and this product made me do so, would not recommend. After a couple uses I threw it away
customer_reviews.author: Mike KinCannon

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: My holy grail skincare product. My number one except for sunscreen. Highly recommend. I apply to wet skin directly after I'm done showering, then stand naked and wait for it to dry (approx 10 minutes). If you have a heated bathroom and can be patient enough, I recommend this method strongly. If it stings a little around your eyes, it's probably the niacinamide that you're feeling sensitivity to... I experienced some of this sensitivity for a little bit on delicate eye skin, but it was never inflamed or too stingy. It eventually stopped stinging at all and hasn't stung since. If you start tretinoin or another form or retinoic acid the stinging may come back temporarily.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie E

customer_reviews.title: Lasting Moisture
customer_reviews.text: This cream is nice and thick without being greasy. It keeps my skin moisturized for 24 hours, which is amazing for someone with dry skin like mine. I used to use Cetaphil cream, but I think something changed in the formula. The last time I bought it, it felt more watery, thinner, and less creamy and didn’t have the same lasting power. I’m glad I made the switch, and as long as CeraVe doesn’t change things up, I’ll stay a loyal customer. I also love that there is zero fragrance or scent to it, so you don’t have to worry about it competing with your perfume or cologne.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Reads A Lot

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's my first time using this moisturizer and I love the consistency and the feel of it on the skin after its absorbed. It's leaves skin feeling soft and smooth without greasy residue nor fragrance. I like to use it on my body and hands, and since it doesn't feel oily/sticky, it's comfortable to wear it to bed. I love it. You will too!
customer_reviews.author: Amie A.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best lotion out there
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Cerave moisturizing cream for about 8 years now after borrowing som from a friend, and I wish I had known about it sooner. I have dry-ish skin, especially in the winter, but it's honestly amazing to use year-round. My favorite things about it: - NOT OILY like other lotions, - a little goes a long way (unlike the Cerave Moisturizing *Lotion*, which I do NOT recommend because it's watered down compared to the cream), - and it's unscented. I cannot recommend this highly enough. It's a little expensive, but well worth the cost because it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony_Z

customer_reviews.title: I like it I love it, I want some more of it
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 10+ jars of the Cerave moisturizing cream. This has turned into a holy grail for me. I have severely dry skin (face and body) and this helps keep my skin soft, moisturized and keeps any dry patches at bay. It creates this sort of barrier or film (in a good way) on my skin that protects it from any outside conditions. I have a dry acne probe skin and this was my last resort as a face moisturizer and I ended up falling in love. This by no means is a luxurious product, but it definitely helps my dry skin. I will continue to use this for the foreseeable future!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Many of my friends swear by this product, so I got this product. Have sensitive skin and After 3 days began developing bumps and zits. Stoped it for 2 weeks then tried it again. Tried it a 3rd time and same pimple and irritated skin results. I use Unscented Lubriderm Daily Moisturize for Normal to Dry Skin Fragrance Free. It is my answer all over...legs, face, body, hands morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, but clogs my pores
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is endorsed by dermatologists and might be helpful with anti-aging. My skin is oily in the T-zone and prone to acne if I don't use a benzoyl peroxide product. When I added this lotion on top of my normal routine I broke out. This happened several times, so now I just use this in the area under my eyes and on my legs. It is very hydrating, but it wasn't compatible with my facial skin type!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one for me...
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I have very dry skin and this product is the first mosturizer that has actually worked for me. I have tried many mosturizers that work while it is on but leaves my skin feeling dryer once it has been worn or washed off. CeraVe goes on a little greasy at first but 5 mins later is soaked in, even after a shower my skin is feeling more hydrated than before. My skin is definently improving. Only con i have found is if I apply soon before using foundation it kind of flakes up a bit. Using atleast 20 mins before applying foundation I have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: Good cream
customer_reviews.text: This is thicker that I anticipated. But my cousin swears it keeps her wrinklles at bay. If my skin looks like hers when I'm 75, I'll buy this till I'm 100 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: annette reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Even my husband uses it!
customer_reviews.text: Winter and age have made our skin very dry. We would apply lotion or hand cream to our skin several times a day. Now we both use this product once when getting out of the shower and don't feel the need to constantly use lotion or hand cream all day long. Doesn't have a scent. Absorbs rapidly and doesn't irritate the skin. Large tub so it lasts for weeks with two people using it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Revels

product_meta.title: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description:
Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Moisturizing Cream has a unique formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II). This rich, non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for sensitive skin on both the face and body.

 * Non-comedogenic
 * Fragrance-free
 * Oil-free
 * Hypoallergenic
 * Gentle, non-irritating formula
 * Suitable for sensitive skin



Key Ingredients:

 * MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration
 * Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
 * Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture.
feature_bullets: [ DRY SKIN CREAM ] Suitable for use on the entire body, face, and even as hand cream for dry hands
[ ALL DAY HYDRATION ] Provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II)
[ MOISTURE-RETAINING INGREDIENTS ] Formulated with hyaluronic acid to help retain skin's natural moisture
[ PATENTED TECHNOLOGY ] Utilizes patented MVE controlled-release technology to help replenish ceramides and deliver long lasting moisturization
[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Free of fragrance and oil, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and non-irritating
